name: Cyberunner
description:
Ok first, i'm just a beginner game developer that's learn how to make some games on Godot engine.

So i decided to make this platformer game to be my first game on godot

On this game you can kill the enemies by shooting them, collect the bitcoin and ethereum that's in game collectable items, and of course running & jumping to the end of the level to complete it.

This game is currently on demo version and just have 1 level, yeah maybe i will update this game later, but for now i don't know what to do next on this game project .

For the game assets, i used "Warped City 2" by ansimuz, and some of it is by myself, like the title, buttons, bitcoin, ethereum, healthbar, etc. i make it on Adobe Photoshop and also Aseprite.

*Note: for now i'm not setup yet the itch.io payment, so everyone is can't donate me for now.

Warped City 2 by Ansimuz
